entry.question: Can I put this on Decepticons?
entry.answer: Yes, just because it is an Autobot card doesn’t mean that restricts who you can play it on. Take Energon Mace as an inverse example.

entry.question: What happens when I attack with this on a character who is a Leader, but isn’t a Wrecker?
entry.answer: You only get an additional +1, making the total added value of this card +2 ATK, Bold 1, Pierce 1.

entry.question: What happens when I attack with this on a character who is a Wrecker, but isn’t a Leader?
entry.answer: You only get an additional +1, making the total added value of this card +2 ATK, Bold 1, Pierce 1.

entry.question: Do I get both bonuses if I attack with a character who is both a Leader and a Wrecker?
Does my character keep the bonuses from the “attacks” triggers if my opponent reveals a Sabotaged Armaments?
entry.answer: You would keep the bonus ATK from the second and third abilities, if applicable. However, you would lose the Weapon’s static +1 ATK, Bold 1, and Pierce 1 that it normally gives.
